Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q4

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q4-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q4-2Mild (30 – 59 minutes to fall asleep) and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q4-3Mild (30 – 59 minutes to fall asleep) and Occasional
    Q4-4Mild (30 – 59 minutes to fall asleep) and Much of the time
    Q4-5Mild (30 – 59 minutes to fall asleep) and Almost all the time
    Q4-6Marked (1 hour or more to fall asleep) and Occasional
    Q4-7Marked (1 hour or more to fall asleep) and Much of the time
    Q4-8Marked (1 hour or more to fall asleep) and Almost all the time
